location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 348 of 1850 from Lieutenant-Colonel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, to His Excellency Colonel Justin Sheil, Her Majesty's Minister Plenipotentiary and Envoy Extraordinary at the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter reports on continued slave trading activity at a number of Persian ports, with intelligence of specific vessels and numbers of slaves seen at the Persian ports of Lingah [Bandar-e Lengeh], Congoon [Bandar-e Kangan], Mohumrah [Khorramshahr] and Karrak [Bandar-e Charak].
